import{useArgonController,setLayout}from"context";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function PageLayout(_ref){let{background,children}=_ref;const[controller,dispatch]=useArgonController();const{darkMode}=controller;const{pathname}=useLocation();useEffect(()=>{setLayout(dispatch,"page");},[pathname]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArgonBox,{width:"100vw",height:"100%",minHeight:"100vh",bgColor:darkMode?"transparent":background,sx:{overflowX:"hidden"},children:children});}// Setting default values for the props for PageLayout
